newsitem.title: JAPAN: PRESS DIGEST - Top Japan business news - July 7.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - Top Japan business news - July 7.

text.p: Following are some of the leading stories in the Japanese press on Monday, as reported by Kyodo news agency.
-- Liberal Democratic Party (LDP) regains strength, while Japan Communist Party doubles seats in Tokyo metropolitan assembly election.
-- Saw allegedly used in beheading of 11-year-old boy found in Kobe pond.
-- Political focus turning to realignment of opposition parties after Tokyo metropolitan assembly election
